string.text: Any content purchased in an in-game store will be purchased from Sony Interactive Entertainment Network Europe Limited (“SIENE”) and be subject to PlayStation™Network Terms of Service and User Agreement which is available on the PlayStation™Store. Please check usage rights for each purchase as these may differ from item to item. Unless otherwise shown, content available in any in-game store has the same age rating as the game.
string.text_US: Purchase and use of items are subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement. This online service has been sublicensed to you by Sony Interactive Entertainment America.

string.text:
這是《S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Call of Prypiat》的主機版本。
 
 在變異區的世界裡，時間停留在車諾比核災的當下。從那時起，這個地方就維持相同的樣子：符號、標語、貨幣，以及其他許多東西都保持沒變。
 我們秉持著一貫的理念。有些東西我們現在會以不同方式處理，但會衷於原樣。遊戲中所有內容都是用來營造氣氛，並作為作品的歷史參考。我們希望你也會和其他眾多的潛行者一樣愛上變異區。
 
 潛行者，祝你狩獵愉快！
 GSC Game World團隊敬上
There is not enough memory to install modification:
Waring! Installed modifications require a lot of video memory. The game might be unstable
